body.name: Steam Cleaners for Home Use, 2500W High Pressure Steam Cleaner with 6 Brush Heads, Towel, Sponge Handheld Steam Cleaner, High Temperature Fast Heating Steamer for Cleaning Kitchen,Bathroom(White)

features: ★【Fast heating, only 10s!】This steam cleaner can be ready in 10 seconds with a powerful 2500W heater steam cleaners for home use, making your cleaning more efficient and convenient!

★【Eliminate stubborn stains!】This steamer for cleaning is simple and easy to use, it only requires simple steps to get your stubborn stains cleaned off. This high pressure steam cleaner includes 1 steam cleaner, 6 brush heads, 1 absorbent towel (color random), 1 pair of gloves

★【6-step temperature adjustment】This steamer has 6 different levels of adjustable temperature through 3 different brush heads and is suitable for cleaning various surfaces such as stoves, walls, microwaves, washing machines, refrigerators, etc. It is widely used in kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, cars, etc. This steamer for car detailing has a maximum temperature of 221°F/105°C
★【Extra large water tank: 1L!】This handheld steam cleaner has a 1000ml water tank, allowing you to use it for close to 1 hour continuously during cleaning!
★【Attentive 24-hour online service!】This steam cleaner We offer 24-hour online customer service, so you can ask us any questions about this handheld steamer for cleaning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice little steam cleaner. Bought it to clean tub and shower. Eats right through soap scum. I suggest wearing gloves as this baby gets real hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: My first complaint is that I really wish the power cord were a couple feet longer. My second complaint is that if you follow the fill line guide it will splash out of the fill hole before reaching the max fill line.In terms of performance... I'm very satisfied. I went to clean a condo where I don't believe the top of the kitchen cabinets have ever been cleaned before. And my multipurpose cleaner with mild degreaser was not getting the job done without a heavy dose of elbow grease. So I broke out this little steamer and it cut through it like a hot knife through butter. I also used it to clean their utility closets door track. Which, again, vacuuming and scrubbing with a brush and my multipurpose cleaner didn't quite do the job. I would advise caution on these more constricted areas as it does cause a lot more splashing. So please do use the gloves that are provided or similar thick gloves.One use that I really wish I had taken a before and after photo of was their bath tub. It took care of the mildew and the built up soap scum in the grout so beautifully. And the bottom of the tub has these non slip lines that just don't ever seem to scrub clean, even with barkeepers friend. And this little machine cleaned them so well that you cannot even tell the non slip feature exists.I've also used it in my home to get marker and crayon out of my tile grout. It's especially great for those hard to reach corners and crevices that no brush or cloth can seem to reach.As for the size of the reservoir, I did have to refill twice for the cabinet job and once for the tub, but I've learned to just carry a 16oz water bottle that I can refill it with rather than dragging the machine itself to the sink. And with as much water as you'll be blasting around, get yourself a bunch of microfiber towels or those sham wow things. Something that absorbs a lot, wrings well, and dries quickly. I found I rarely needed it above setting 3 and when used at a higher setting you'll definitely go through the reservoir much faster. And it will fog your glasses much more at the higher settings.Overall, I really enjoy this little guy. I don't think I could go back to before I had one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for deep cleaning and have own steaming cleaning devices in the past. The small size of this product is great! However, I think the fact the steam goes down a long tube creates condensate and then the output is half steam/half water. It makes a mess. Also, the brass fittings are needed but it was too easy to grab the brass instead of the small protective handle. I burnt my fingers many times and started wearing gloves. Didn't clean very well. Returned the item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effortlessly it removes built-up dirt.
reviews.reviewText: This little gadget has been a game-changer in my cleaning routine, particularly when it comes to tackling tough grout lines and restoring the look of my floors.The steam cleaner’s ability to clean grout lines is simply incredible. I was amazed at how effortlessly it removes built-up dirt, grime, and stains that have been challenging to clean with traditional methods. The high-temperature steam not only sanitizes the surfaces but also leaves them looking refreshed and renewed.My floors have never looked better! The handheld steam cleaner has brought new life to the grout, making it look like I just had it professionally cleaned. I love how it effortlessly rejuvenates the appearance of my tiles, giving them that brand-new shine.One of the best things about this handheld steam cleaner is its ease of use. It’s lightweight and portable, allowing me to maneuver it around the house with ease. The variety of attachments included makes it versatile for different cleaning tasks, from grout lines to countertops and even upholstery.It uses steam as a natural cleaning agent without the need for harsh chemicals is a big plus for me. I feel confident using it on various surfaces without worrying about harmful residues or fumes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Broke within 10 uses
reviews.reviewText: The nozzle comes off very frequently, the heating element causes the steamer to spurt lots of water before concentrated steam is produced. There is no switch in the handle. After about 10 uses the product has stopped producing steam entirely. It gets hot but no steam is pumped out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super powerful in a small package
reviews.reviewText: It's PERFECT for cleaning my grill....which is why I bought it. That said, I can see so many more uses for this thing. It's a really powerful compact steamer especially for the price. Just be careful....the parts come loose if you don't more than finger tighten them. And, though I shouldn't really have to say this, but the metal parts GET REALLY HOT! ;-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this thing
reviews.reviewText: I’m steaming everything, it’s it’s cleaning made simple!
